Upload new meme A confirmation email will be sent to the address you entered Login options Buy/Sell Connecting to server Welcome to MemeBroker, Sign up to continue Have an account?\ Welcome back to MemeBroker Sign in to continue New broker?\ This email is already occupied Let\'s finish formalities Verify email to complete registration Do you want to quit the app? Exit Help Buying and selling memes Uploading memes All about respect All about the shortlist Wrong language \t The price of every meme is calculated from the number of shares that were sold. You can buy any amount of shares of any meme, but every share is more expensive than the previous one. To buy shares of a meme, just tap the image, then choose "Buy" and set the amount of shares you want to purchase.\n \t All memes you own will appear in your "Assets" tab. To sell memes, tap them from your assets list, choose "Sell" and set the amount of shares you want to sell.\n \t Please note that you cannot spend more than 2/3 of your money on a single purchase. \t \t Any user can upload his own meme to MemeBroker. You can do this by pressing the \"Upload\" button in the lower right corner. You will be prompted to choose an image from your storage. After you have chosen the image a smaller copy of it will appear on your screen. Make sure it is uploaded in the correct orientation and rotate it using the "rotate" button otherwise.\n \t Please note that all images will be scaled to reduce data traffic. Also note that adult content is strictly prohibited, as well as any illegal or abusive content. All users that upload inappropriate images will be banned(more about bans and respect in \"All about respect\").\n \t Your meme may take several minutes to be published, because all images are automatically inspected for inappropriate content.
Users that help us improve MemeBroker will recieve respect points. A user loses respect points if they violate our rules. Users with zero respect will be banned.\n \t For example, if a user reports an inappropriate meme, he recieves 5 respect points, but if the reported meme does not break our rules, the user loses 5 respect points.\n \t If a user uploads a meme that violates our rules, their respect can be lowered by any value, up to immediate ban.
The shortlist is an instrument which will help you analyze how share prices change. \n \t You can add any meme to your shortlist by long-pressing the image and then choosing the "add to shortlist" option. You can access your shortlist from the menu.\n \tThe meme tabs in the shortlist show the current price of one share and how much a share cost when you added this meme.\n \tYou can long-tap the meme to update the start price. To delete a meme from a shortlist just swipe it to the side.
